items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress!
items.body: Absolutely LOVE this dress!! It fits perfectly, it has the perfect sparkle and also comfortable with an adjustable zip for the split height. I got a ‘hot damn’ when I came down the stairs after changing out of my wedding dress! Read more
items.author: NG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!
items.body: My favorite dress I've ever gotten off of Amazon! It is so flattering on my plus size figure, it's got a nice stretch and fits like a glove. I'm 5'2" and it is the perfect length to be worn with heels or flats. The rhinestones are well applied and I don't expect they'll be falling off. I love that the slit is a zipper so you can adjust it to what you're comfortable with and what's appropriate for the occasion you're wearing it for. Absolutely recommend. I will say I usually wear an XL in dresses or L in shirts, but the XXL here was absolutely perfect for me, so you might want to size up, unless you want the dress to be quite tight on you. Read more
items.author: Kat K

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: This dress was very nice great stretch and hit all of my curves. I love the way I can adjust my split with the side zipper. This dress is true to size. Read more
items.author: Al-Nisa Brooks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: The media could not be loaded. So comfy and elegant. There is a zipper for the slit so you can have a high one or low one. Read more
items.author: Alyssa Martine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress looks good on everyone!
items.body: Great dress, got many compliments! Purchased in a pinch and it gave me everything I was looking for. Non-see through comfortable material. Great stretch (try 1 or 2 sizes up for comfort) and the best part is the hidden adjustable zipper split. A chiffon shrug compliments it very nicely for an even more formal look. Read more
items.author: Carmen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: What a great dress! It fit well and the under support was amazing. I would definitely buy from this vendor again. 5'8" 175lbs and wore an XL. Perfect fit. Read more
items.author: KIM

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Is not true to size
items.author: Juan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Cute but very thin, not see through kind of a skins dupe Read more
items.author: ldg29

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Split Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Split Cocktail Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
